subject: Fix mobile web scrolling and pagination auto-scroll behavior
body:
Resolved issue where loading older messages via pagination would trigger
unwanted auto-scroll to bottom, creating an infinite scroll loop on mobile web.

Changes:
- Add isLoadingMoreRef to track pagination state in chat screen
- Update onContentSizeChange to distinguish between new messages and pagination
- Modify polling mechanism to preserve paginated messages when updating recent messages
- Only auto-scroll when genuinely new messages arrive, not during history loading

This ensures smooth infinite scroll behavior while maintaining auto-scroll for new messages.
title: Fix mobile web scrolling and pagination auto-scroll behavior
